mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(INST.STARTEDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS STARTEDDATE, INST.DEFNAME, COUNT(1) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST INNER JOIN BPM_WORKLIST WL ON WL.INSTID = INST.INSTID WHERE INST.STATUS = 'RUNNING' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 AND WL.STATUS IN ('NEW','CONFIRMED','DRAFT') AND (SYSDATE()-7 <= INST.STARTEDDATE OR INST.STARTEDDATE <= SYSDATE()-1) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(INST.STARTEDDATE,'%M-%D-%Y'), INST.DEFNAME ORDER BY STARTDATE
SELECT INST.DEFNAME, COUNT(1) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST WHERE INST.STATUS = 'RUNNING' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME;

SELECT INST.DEFNAME, COUNT(CASE WHEN DUEDATE <= FINISHEDDATE THEN 1 END) AS DELAYEDCOUNT FROM BPM_PROCINST INST INNER JOIN BPM_PROCDEF DEF ON INST.DEFID = DEF.DEFID WHERE INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0 AND DEF.OBJTYPE = 'PROCESS' AND DEF.ALIAS IN (SELECT ALIAS FROM BPM_PROCDEF WHERE ISDELETED = 0 AND OBJTYPE = 'PROCESS' ) GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME ORDER BY ALIAS;

SELECT INST.DEFNAME, DATE_FORMAT(INST.FINISHEDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS FINISHEDDATE, FORMAT(AVG(DATEDIFF(INST.FINISHEDDATE,INST.STARTEDDATE)+1),0) AS WORKINGDAYAVG FROM BPM_PROCINST INST WHERE INST.STATUS = 'COMPLETED' AND INST.ISDELETED = 0 AND INST.ISSUBPROCESS = 0
GROUP BY INST.DEFNAME, DATE_FORMAT(INST.FINISHEDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');
